ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t understand your question (soft cap? uber-guild conspiracy?) but I have been on raids, very recently, and have seen first hand where the bard resist
ygData.messageBody:
I don't understand your question (soft cap? uber-guild conspiracy?) but I
have been on raids, very recently, and have seen first hand where the bard
resist songs makes a significant difference. And this is not a one time
observation.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: beatdropbattledrum@...
[mailto:beatdropbattledrum@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 5:33 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Patch Message


Has this soft cap on resists been confirmed? Or are we just relying
on this uberguild leader that may have a conspiracy against bards?
LOL!

~Beatdrop Battledrum


--- In eqbards@y..., James Schuldes <jgs@s...> wrote:
> Not true in my experience. Bard songs that buff resists do still
make a
> difference.
>
> Sylly
